articles.author: Times News Network
articles.title: Vax works: No cases of lumpy skin disease in cattle noted yet this year
articles.description: Panaji: The Goa animal husbandry department has announced that no cases of lumpy skin disease in cattle have been reported for the current fiscal year.

articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: Govt culls 310 pigs to contain African Swine Fever outbreak in Kerala
articles.description:
The Centre on Sunday said around 310 pigs have been culled in Kerala's Thrissur district after an outbreak of African Swine Fever (ASF).
The outbreak was detected in Madakkatharan Panchayath, prompting swift action from the state's Animal Husbandry Department…
articles.content:
